definition: to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Get your story straight and tell the truth for once for heaven's sake.
sentences.chinese: 看在老天的份上你要是编不圆谎就说一次实话吧。

sentences.english: Then you lied about lying, okay?
sentences.chinese: 然后，你又说谎去圆谎，好吗？
